backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor implementing user profiles, access control, quiz and article storage, and question retrieval with permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten mapping of frontend file paths to descriptive summaries used for reference or tooling.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment configuration showing translation API URL options and how to provide backend canister IDs.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining the cyber-themed OKLCH color system, dark mode, and safe-area insets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that forces dark mode and loads env.json at runtime before bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/env.json: Runtime environment file containing a placeholder backend canister ID and build metadata fields.
frontend/PUBLISHING.md: Publishing guide explaining how to deploy the app via the Caffeine editor and configure env.json correctly.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, view routing, diagnostics, and quiz gameplay flow without study-article routing.
frontend/src/components/AppHeaderBrand.t: Brand header component showing app title and metadata using an icon.
frontend/src/components/BuildIdentityFoo: Footer displaying build version, timestamp, and deployment ID retrieved from build metadata.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentDiagno: React panel that gathers and displays deployment diagnostics, connection info, runtime environment status, and health check results with various actions like copying and sharing.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button that handles Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/PendingUpdateBan: Shows a dismissible banner when a new app build is available, allowing users to refresh or ignore it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: UI for initial profile setup that collects a user name and saves it to the backend.
frontend/src/config/index.ts: Configures canister actor creation, agent host selection, declaration loading, and connection info resolution.
frontend/src/config/translation.ts: Simple translation utility that sends text to a translation API and returns the translated result.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackupRestore.ts: Hook for exporting and restoring full application state via snapshot serialization and backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useExportAllQuestions: Hook that exports all quizzes with their questions and block names, handling errors and diagnostics recording.
frontend/src/hooks/useGenerateArticle.ts: Provides a React Query hook that requests an article from an actor and validates/normalizes its content.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity React context and provider handling login, identity loading, and status tracking via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePendingUpdate.ts: Checks if the app build has changed since last visit and exposes a flag and method to mark the current build as seen.
frontend/src/hooks/usePressHold.ts: Tracks press‑and‑hold interactions and returns a boolean state plus pointer and keyboard event handlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, quizzes, and questions through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuestionTranslatio: Manages translation requests with caching, deduping, and error handling for question text.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuizRecovery.ts: Provides logic to copy questions from one quiz to another and invalidate relevant queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Imports the global theme stylesheet wrapper.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up the React app root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/quiz/adaptiveScheduler.ts: Implements an adaptive question scheduler with first-pass randomization, repeat logic, and mastery tracking.
frontend/src/quiz/BackupRestorePanel.tsx: UI panel enabling users to export quiz backups to JSON and restore them with confirmation prompts.
frontend/src/quiz/blockUtils.ts: Utility helpers for dividing questions into 100-question blocks and labeling or extracting block ranges.
frontend/src/quiz/draftStorage.ts: Handles saving, loading, and clearing quiz drafts in localStorage with versioned serialization.
frontend/src/quiz/imageUtils.ts: Utilities for validating JPEG files, converting to bytes, creating previews, and producing ExternalBlobs.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/PdfImportPre: Empty placeholder file for PDF import preview UI.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/pdfImportTyp: Empty placeholder for PDF import type definitions.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/pdfTextExtra: Empty placeholder intended for PDF text extraction logic.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/questionExtr: Empty placeholder for parsing extracted PDF text into quiz questions.
frontend/src/quiz/PreGameQuestionCountVi: UI for selecting number of quiz questions with loading, validation, and slider controls.
frontend/src/quiz/PreQuizSummaryView.tsx: Shows a summary of selected block and question count before starting a quiz with validation and navigation options.
frontend/src/quiz/QuestionImagePicker.ts: Handles JPEG image upload, validation, preview, removal, and progress tracking for a question.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizEditor.tsx: Full quiz editor supporting question management, blocks, recovery, exporting, image attachments, and draft handling.
frontend/src/quiz/quizFlowDiagnostics.ts: Provides optional console-based quiz flow diagnostics controlled via localStorage.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizGameplay.tsx: Manages full quiz flow including block selection, question count, randomized session creation, answering, translation, and scoring.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizResults.tsx: Displays final quiz score with options to replay, review wrong answers, or return to editor.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizScoreBar.tsx: Fixed bottom bar showing current quiz score and answered count.
frontend/src/quiz/randomSubset.ts: Generates randomized index subsets using Fisher-Yates shuffle with clamped sizes.
frontend/src/quiz/sessionTypes.ts: Defines interfaces for tracking question performance and session state.
frontend/src/quiz/StudyArticleView.tsx: Renders a study-article view for a question with back handling and optional article content display.
frontend/src/quiz/TroubleshootingPanel.t: Provides a collapsible panel showing quiz lists and question counts for diagnosing data issues.
frontend/src/quiz/types.ts: Re-exports Question and QuizId types from backend.
frontend/src/quiz/validation.ts: Validates quiz questions, ensuring required content, answer counts, non-empty answers, and valid correct-answer indexes.
frontend/src/quiz/WrongAnswersReview.tsx: Displays a scrollable list of wrong answers with question text and an escape-triggered back action.
frontend/src/quiz/wrongAnswerTypes.ts: Defines the WrongAnswerEntry interface for tracking wrong-answer review metadata.
frontend/src/types/env.d.ts: Declares environment variable types for Vite and window.__ENV__ runtime metadata.
frontend/src/utils/actorConnectionInfo.t: Resolves backend connection details including host, network, and canister ID via sync or async methods.
frontend/src/utils/buildStamp.ts: Generates and caches build metadata prioritizing runtime env.json and provides a stable build identifier.
Resolves backend canister ID from multiple sources with priority ordering and diagnostic tracking.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Collects, stores, and formats deployment-related errors with environment and connection metadata.
frontend/src/utils/formatPublishChecklis: Builds a detailed publish checklist including build info, canister resolution details, and deployment instructions.
frontend/src/utils/liveReadiness.ts: Evaluates production readiness based on canister ID validity and backend health check results.
frontend/src/utils/quizExport.ts: Exports quiz data to downloadable JSON files and generates timestamped filenames.
Performs a full hard refresh by clearing storage, unregistering service workers, deleting caches, logging errors, and reloading with a cache‑busting URL.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeEnvStatus.ts: Inspects env.json loading status and backend canister ID validity, returning diagnostics and troubleshooting guidance.
frontend/src/utils/shareLiveVerification: Generates a detailed plain‑text verification report including build metadata, canister resolution, env.json status, network info, and health check results.
frontend/src/utils/stateSnapshotJson.ts: Serializes and deserializes full state snapshots with ExternalBlob URL handling and provides basic format validation.
frontend/src/utils/stoppedCanisterDetect: Detects stopped‑canister errors, extracts canister IDs, formats messages, and offers recovery steps for local or remote environments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across query strings and hash routing using sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, color tokens, animations, and UI extensions.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, feature requests, and known build issues for removing study-article access and fixing deployment errors.
unknown.txt: Notes and template logic for generating study articles, including future prompt-building steps and admin permission checks.
